title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 784/93 of 31 March 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3824/92 amending the prices and amounts fixed in ecus as a result of the monetary realignment of September and November 1992
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 784/93 of 31 March 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3824/92 amending the prices and amounts fixed in ecus as a result of the monetary realignment of September and November 1992
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 March 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 22.
(3) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 29.
(4) OJ No L 57, 10. 3. 1993, p. 18.
